com.kremerk.Sqlite
Class DataConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.kremerk.Sqlite.DataConnectionManager

public class DataConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main class used for connecting to the SQLite database. Use the init(String) or init(String, String) methods to specify the path to the database file.

Method Summary
static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
          Gets the raw SQL Connection.
static void init(java.lang.String databaseName)
          Initializes the database connection with the passed in relative path (starting at the user.dir) of the java program.
static void init(java.lang.String databaseName, org.apache.log4j.Level loggerLevel)
          Initializes the database connection with the passed in relative path (starting at the user.dir) of the java program.
static void init(java.lang.String databaseName, java.lang.String pathToDatabase)
          Initializes the database connection with the passed in absolute path to the database and database name.
static void init(java.lang.String databaseName, java.lang.String pathToDatabase, org.apache.log4j.Level loggerLevel)
          Initializes the database connection with the passed in absolute path to the database and database name.

Method Detail

getConnection

public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
Gets the raw SQL Connection.

Returns:
The raw Connection to the database.

init

public static void init(java.lang.String databaseName)
Initializes the database connection with the passed in relative path (starting at the user.dir) of the java program. Logging defaults to org.apache.log4j.Level.WARN

Parameters:
databaseName - The path relative to java property user.dir to the database.

init

public static void init(java.lang.String databaseName,
                        java.lang.String pathToDatabase)
Initializes the database connection with the passed in absolute path to the database and database name. Logging defaults to org.apache.log4j.Level.WARN

Parameters:
databaseName - The absolute path to the database.
loggerLevel - The level at which the ORM should log messages to console.

init

public static void init(java.lang.String databaseName,
                        org.apache.log4j.Level loggerLevel)
Initializes the database connection with the passed in relative path (starting at the user.dir) of the java program. Logging is set to provided level.

Parameters:
databaseName - The absolute path to the database.
pathToDatabase - The filename of the database.

init

public static void init(java.lang.String databaseName,
                        java.lang.String pathToDatabase,
                        org.apache.log4j.Level loggerLevel)
Initializes the database connection with the passed in absolute path to the database and database name. Logging is set to provided level.

Parameters:
databaseName - The absolute path to the database.
pathToDatabase - The filename of the database.
loggerLevel - The level at which the ORM should log messages to console.
